pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 or Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon HD 7400G / NVIDIA GeForce GT 120 or better graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 and later support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A tactical survival RPG. Play a rabbit escaping a koala-run convict camp in a procedurally generated, post-human Australian Outback. Battle emus and hire kangaroo mercenaries. Scavenge supplies, gather and trade materials, recruit followers and rebuild society.
